Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Alexandra Jauhiainen. Author.

  • Olivia Eriksson. Author, maintainer.

  • Federica Milinanni. Author.

  • Andrei Kramer. Author, contributor.

Citation

Kramer A, Milinanni F, Nyquist P, Jauhiainen A, Eriksson O (2023). “UQSA – An R-Package for Uncertainty Quantification and Sensitivity Analysis for Biochemical Reaction Network Models.” doi:10.48550/arXiv.2308.05527, 2308.05527.
